publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-370 Cathie Craigie: HMIE Inspection of Cumbernauld Collegeâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld College on its excellent HM Inspectorate of Education report published on 17 August 2007; notes that the report commends Cumbernauld College for its good learning and teaching processes, with its learners progressing and achieving more; praises the Serious About Learning initiative which has led to improvements across several key areas of college activity; welcomes the major transformation to Cumbernauld town centre that the main campus has achieved, and thanks the principal, senior staff, board of management and students for creating excellent learning environments in Cumbernauld town centre and at the East Dunbartonshire Campus of Further and Higher Education in Kirkintilloch.

S3M-370 HMIE Inspection of Cumbernauld College (lodged on 17 August 2007) Robin Harper*, Mr Frank McAveety*, David Whitton*, Jackie Baillie*, Ken Macintosh*, Karen Whitefield*, Mary Scanlon*, Pauline McNeill*, Michael McMahon*, Trish Godman*, Jamie Hepburn*, Karen Gillon*, Rhona Brankin*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-370 HMIE Inspection of Cumbernauld College (lodged on 17 August 2007) Alex Neil*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-370 HMIE Inspection of Cumbernauld College (lodged on 17 August 2007) Hugh Henry*
S3M-370 HMIE Inspection of Cumbernauld College (lodged on 17 August 2007) Jack McConnell*
